nodes.text: Sam was a female pilot who served in the Alliance to Restore the Republic during the lead-up to the Galactic Civil War. Assigned the callsign of Red Leader, she was leader of Red Flight, a group of T-65B X-wing starfighters. Around 0 BBY, Sam, along with the rest of Red Flight were deployed to assist Extraction Team Bravo in the Wobani system.

Sam first appeared as a non-playable character in the 2016 Star Wars Battlefront: Rogue One: X-wing VR Mission, a downloadable virtual reality add-on to the 2015 canon video game Star Wars Battlefront.
